thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 10 of 1846
thread.title: arvind

author: arvind
title: arvind
text: I came across Flighthub after checking out various online sites. At first I was skeptical that they can offer better rates than airlines or sites like expedia or others. But having used them, I can say without hesitancy that Flighthub is the only site I visit for all my bookings. I also experienced their great customer care when I had to make changes to my flight when I was overseas. A1 service! Bravo!
